snippet.title: PSYCHOFUNK - Psychedelic Platformer - Trailer
snippet.description:
You control the platforms in this innovative new psychedelic platformer from the creator of No More Buttons.

Go on a psychedelic adventure inspired by the trippy 60s and funky 70s. Get ready for a platforming challenge unlike anything you've ever experienced.

Made especially for your phone

Psychofunk is a platformer where you push the platforms in and out like the buttons on an old cassette player. This is an experience tailor made for the touch screen on your phone. (Available on iPhone, iPad and Android.)

Experience exhilarating BOSS FIGHTS 

Travel through the four seasons into madness and fight intense boss fights. This game will challenge you.

DOWNLOAD (App Store):
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/psychofunk/id1547164915

DOWNLOAD (Google Play):
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tommysoereide.psychofunk

Read more about PSYCHOFUNK here:
https://www.tommysoereide.com/psychofunk
